ygData.subject: Still hangin!
ygData.msgSnippet: I know it s been a while scince I posted anything. Since every spare moment at home goes either to keeping the wife happy, or EQ, there s been no time club
ygData.messageBody:
I know it's been a while scince I posted
anything. Since every spare moment at home goes either to
keeping the wife happy, or EQ, there's been no time club
chat! ( A man's gotta keep his priorities straight! )
Anyhow, as I'm at work, on a weekend night shift, I got
tons of time to read, reply, inquire and answer.<br> I
took a trip to Crushbone. Lots of fun to be had in
there for groups of low to mid teens. The Throne room
is so busy, I actually get physically tired trying
to keep up. Crushbone belts, and legionaire pads are
worth big exp, and loot to a certain Dwarf in the
warrior guild in Kaladim. He's the one at the end of the
hallway to the right after you run through the dining
hall in the guild. Lots of folks know this, and lots
don't, so the ones who do are always trying to beg or
buy belts and lego pads off the ones who don't.<br>
Also, if you're a level 13, the Chessboard in Northwest
Butcherblock Mountains is UNREAL EXP!! I tell you no lies! I
solo'd the place for about 5 hours as a L13 paladin, and
made it all the way to L14 there. If you're a melee
type, and have a casting buddy (or vice-versa) GO
THERE. You can turn the bone chips in to a Dwarf Paladin
(Male guy to the left in brown mail)in packs of 4 for
exp and weapons. Another little known good deal
there.<br> Work intrudes! (dammit!) more later.<br><br>
DudeUg<br> Foleen<br> L14 Paladin<br> Currently in East
Commons
